item.title: 「$125,000 Leveraged Long on ETH Liquidated」 Whale's ETH long position was liquidated for 2150 ETH and voluntarily reduced by 2500 ETH, bringing the liquidation price down to $4198.
item.description: August 19th. As per on-chain analyst Yu Jin, the whale address that carried out a "Long ETH with 125k USD in Collateral" had its position liquidated, leading to the liquidation of 2150 ETH. Subsequently, the whale voluntarily decreased its position by another 2500 ETH, causing the liquidation price to drop to $4198.Currently, the whale still maintains a long ETH position worth $124 million through two addresses. The liquidation price for Address 1 is $4177, and for Address 2 is $4198. The initial capital has decreased from a floating loss of $6.99 million yesterday to $3.65 million at present.

item.title: Heaven's native token LIGHT surpasses a $200 million market cap, reaching an all-time high.
item.description: On August 19th, based on the GMGN market data, the native token LIGHT of the Solana-based AMM and Launchpad platform Heaven has exceeded a market capitalization of $200 million. It is now at $202 million and has reached a new all-time high with a 24-hour increase of 54%.It is introduced that LIGHT is the native token of Heaven and is also the first token issued on the Heaven platform through Heaven's Genesis ICO and entered the market. 100% of Heaven's revenue will be used to buy back LIGHT in a real-time and programmable manner and burn it.

item.title: Coinbase has completed scheduled maintenance, and services have been restored
item.description: On August 19th, Coinbase announced, "The scheduled maintenance has been finished and services have been resumed."

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Falls Below $115,000
item.description: On August 19th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin fell below $115,000, experiencing a 24-hour loss of 0.17%.

item.title: Bithumb Adds BIO-KRW Trading Pair
item.description: On August 19th, Bithumb incorporated the BIO/KRW trading pair.

item.title: 「$125,000 Margin Long on ETH」 Whale Reduces Position by 2,900.59 ETH, with a Latest Liquidation Price of $4,226.4
item.description: On August 19th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "125k USD Long ETH Liquidation" whale has just reduced its position by 2,900.59 ETH, resulting in a loss of 238k USD.It lowered its position in the address with relatively less liquidation space, 0x5f72...da67, to 7,852.35 ETH, and the latest liquidation price is 4,226.4 USD.

item.title: A certain whale in the cryptocurrency community has offloaded 1550 WETH, realizing a profit of $3.211 million.
item.description: On August 19th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the 2018 ETH swing trader whale 0xF89...8AEfe has completely liquidated 1550 WETH that was purchased on June 23rd at an average price of $2285, realizing a profit of $3.211 million.Over the past four years, he has carried out a total of 4 ETH swing trades and accumulated a profit of $3.739 million.

item.title: Illinois Passes Two Cryptocurrency Regulation Bills Covering Exchanges and Crypto ATMs
item.description: August 19th. JB Pritzker, the governor of Illinois, has signed the "Digital Asset and Consumer Protection Act" (SB 1797) and the "Digital Asset ATM Act" (SB 2319). The former empowers the state's Department of Financial and Professional Regulation to regulate digital asset exchanges and related businesses, mandating that they maintain sufficient financial resources and implement cybersecurity measures. The latter centers on cryptocurrency ATMs, requiring operators to register, offer full refunds to fraud victims, cap transaction fees at 18%, and restrict daily transactions for new users to $2500.

item.title: The blockchain game Pirate Nation will temporarily suspend full on-chain operations, and some content will be preserved through Abstract's Proof of Play Arcade.
item.description: On August 19th, the blockchain game Pirate Nation announced via Twitter that it will suspend full on-chain operations within the earliest 30 days. "We will freeze the full on-chain operations of the Pirate Nation game, as well as the Apex and Boss chains, within the earliest 30 days starting from today. From an economic standpoint, operating two chains simultaneously is no longer viable. The exciting aspects of the game will continue to exist on the Proof of Play platform on Abstract. The platform's format enables us to gradually port different parts of the game to other chains over time and potentially even to other chains in the future. Regarding Founder's Pirates, we will conduct the final PIRATE token distribution, after which they will transition to community identity NFTs and will no longer be eligible for token claims."

item.title: Longling Capital has once again sold 5,000 ETH today
item.description: On August 19th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, Longling Capital once more sold 5,000 ETH today, with a value of $21.56 million. They focus on swing trading ETH, buying at low prices and selling at high prices.Over the past two years, they have withdrawn 123,405 ETH ($290 million) from Binance at an average price of $2,349. Subsequently, they deposited 70,800 ETH ($248 million) at an average price of $3,502, making a profit of $184 million.
